li.a: MESSAGE FROM THE HEAD OF SCHOOL

li.class: navmenu_button menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-has-children fl-has-submenu

span.b: SCHOOL WILL BE CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE.

span.strong: CLICK HERE TO VIEW LINK'S DEDICATED COVID-19 PAGE.

p.span: Online instruction will resume on Monday, April 20.

Breakfast and lunch meals will be available at Link during the week of April 20 on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday from 9 am-1 pm.Â Beginning April 27, meals will be distributed on Tuesdays and Fridays in consideration of Mayor Baraka's guidelines for "Be Still Mondays." Famiies will receive up to three meals each day.

During school closures, the Link Community Charter School Board of Trustees meetings will take place via teleconference, as permitted by the NJDOE. For information on how to access the meeting, click here.

a.title: Join an exceptional team of educators and change the trajectory of a childâs life!
Join an exceptional team of educators and change the trajectory of a childâs life!

h2.a: Join an exceptional team of educators and change the trajectory of a childâs life!

div.p: Work in supportive and caring core values-based community that narrows the opportunity and achievement gaps to deliver strong student outcomes. Experience a positive school environment and structured systems to support strong instruction, and a robust professional development program that includes consistent coaching and feedback as well as opportunities for leadership. Apply now!

h6.span: NOTICE OF NON-DISCRIMINATORY POLICY AS TO STUDENTS

p.span: Link Community Charter School admits students of any race, color, and national and ethnic origin to all the rights, privileges, programs, and activities generally accorded or made available to students at the school. It does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, or national and ethnic origin in administration of its educational policies, admissions policies, scholarship and loan programs, and athletic and other school-administered programs.
